231a3('dul ba): kyi nye 'khor ba de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug log khang de nyid du smin zhing byed pas/der dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams
231a4('dul ba): la rnyed po mang po byung ngo //ston zla tha chungs kyi g.yon can dag kun tu spyod pa ni/dgag dbye byang ma thag tu 'dus te bodag cag gi sau las tso zhig byas na/des brtsal mi dgos
231a5('dul ba): par mi na sumachis par thob por 'gyur zhes ngan tshun gyis byed do//de dag 'di snyam du sems te/shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag gzhon par bya'o snyam mo//
231a6('dul ba): gzhan dag gis smras pa/de dag ni sgo 'phar brgya rnyed bzla ba byas kyang hU~M ldongs pa 'grub par dka' bas de dag la ci ying mod na/bdag cag ci'i phyir yul de srod du bsdu
231a7('dul ba): par bya/de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa cig 'dug pas smras po/khyed ci shes de dag la mang du yod do//ji ltar re shig gtsug lag khang 'di gang gi yon pa khyim dge de ni
231b1('dul ba): dang can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pan+dan yin la/khyim bdag de la yang gtsug lag khang 'ad cag pu 'bra' zhig yod pas/de sbyin pa dang /byA zlar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad
231b2('dul ba): gtsug lag khung 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do//riblugs 'din yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad bcug
231b3('dul ba): lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin ni pyid do/b+huka s+phu 'di'i nye 'khor na yang gi tsug lag khang gzhan med pas/ri brags kyi nye 'khor ba 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa
231b4('dul ba): de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas/'dir dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo //gal tI yid mi ches na song la ltos
231b5('dul ba): shig dang rang nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur//gal te de lta na khyod nyid je sod la mngon sum du gyis shig dang /kho bo cag phyis 'ong ngo //des smras pa/legs kyis de bzhin gyis
231b6('dul ba): shig dang /kho bo 'gro'o zhes dris gos chags bcos te 'phags shing de nas tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te/gtsug lag khang der zhug so//
231b7('dul ba): ji tsam na sgo khang na rgan zhugs zhig 'dug nas g.yon can de de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dri bar brtsams pa/'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris
232a1('dul ba): them ska su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/bzhin bzangs khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi yin no//'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam 'on te phongs pa
232a2('dul ba): lags/bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ci lta bu yin/phongs pa ji lta bu yin 'phags pa gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lagaso//gang na yo byad ma
232a3('dul ba): mchis pa ni phongs pa lagaso//bzhin bzangs 'o na 'di ni gtsug lag khang yin gyi/phongs pa ma yin te/'di na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yod kyi/'di na yo byad med pa ma
232a4('dul ba): yin no//'phags pa zas za ba ni 'ga' yang sa rdul mi za la gos dag gyon pa ni 'ga' yang shing shun dag mi gyon pas khyed cag la gos cung zad mchis sam/rgon zhugs de
232a5('dul ba): drang ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas/des g.yon can de'i lag nas bzung ste gnas khang du bcug nas smras pa/bzhin bzangs gos kyi rdang gos dag gis phur shog cing 'dug
232a6('dul ba): ba la ltos/'phags pa ci 'di khyod kyi lags sam 'on te dge 'dun gyi lags/bzhin bzangs 'di kho bo gang zag yin no//'phags pa nyon khyod ni gor ma bkum par dge
232a7('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam chos sgrog pa zhig lagaso//bzhin bzangs kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yang ma yin la chos sgrog pa yang ma yin te/'di ltar kho bo ni dge
232b1('dul ba): 'dun gsar bu dge tshul zhig yin no//'phags pa de ni mjal na 'di na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal cung zad mchis sam/bzhin bzangs mang du yod de/re shig kho bo'i byug ris su yang dngos
232b2('dul ba): po bdun po dag 'thab go//'phags pa de yang mjal gyis 'di zhu'o//gtsug lag khang 'di na gleng la la 'tshal ma bgyid pa de ci rdza mkhan gyi snod du 'tshed dam 'on te zangs ma'i snod du
232b3('dul ba): 'tshod/bzhin bzangs khyod kyis gnas khang 'di dag mthong ngam/'phags pa mthong ngo //bzhin bzangs gnas khang 'di zangs ma'i snod kyis gang zhing 'dug/g.yon can des bsams
232b4('dul ba): pa legs par brid zin gyis da ni 'gro'o snyam nas g.yon can des smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongasu nyams pa ni bdag gi don yongasu nyams pa lags pas bdag
232b5('dul ba): slad kyis kyang mchi'i da ni mchi'o//bzhin bzangs de bzhin gyis shig/g.yon can des rgan zhugs de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas/g.yon can de chom rkun pa de dag gi
232b6('dul ba): drang du song ste smras pa/pad ma'i mig can dag rdzas thams cad kyis grang ba'i gru bo che skams lnga 'dug gis phrogs shig phrogs shing //de nas gcig gis smras pa/de na 'khod
232b7('dul ba): de'i rab tu byung ba drug cu po dag ni 'bong gi slob dpon sha stag yin zhes grag pas/de bzhin du gzhom par mi nus kyis/gang gis tshe de dag mtshan mchis nyan pa de'i tshe
233a1('dul ba): gzhom mo/gzhan drug gis smras pa/nyi ma gang la de dag gi chos nyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur//des smras pa/tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la 'byung ste/de la chos
233a2('dul ba): brgyad ni thal zin pas/tshes bcu bzhi la 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de dag sor mo dag gis nyi mi 'grang zhing 'khod 'khod nas/ji tsam no tshes bcu bzhi la bab ste/dge 'dun
233a3('dul ba): gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo bton te/dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong byas nas/chos sgrog pa seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te 'di skad ces/mi mchog 'dul ba kha lo sgyung
233a4('dul ba): mdzad pa//kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod pa de bzhin gshegs//dbang po zhi zhing nyer zhi zhi la mkhas//mnyan yod bzhugs pag bzhin byed la gsungs//shes smra bar
233a5('dul ba): brtsams pa dang /g.yon can de dag gis sgo brdung so//dge sbyong de dag gis tshor nas smras pa/shes ldan dgra khyed cag su yin/'phags pa dgra bdag cag rigs
233a6('dul ba): kyi bu dag go//dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/ri bregs nas skye bo'i tshogs dag chos nyan du lhags gor ma chag gis sgro dbye'i snyam nas/de dag gis sgo phye ba dang de dag zhug so//ji
233a7('dul ba): tsam na gzhom par rtsams pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag ni re bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go zhes zer na/da nged cag 'joms par byed dam/de
233b1('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/'phags pa dag bdag cag la ming gnyis te/slad rol du ni rigs kyi bu dag ces bgyi la/nang du ni chom rkun pa dag ces bgyi'o//khyed cag ming 'dogs par byed pa ni
233b2('dul ba): nyam so//g.yon can de dag gis dge slong dag bcom ste dong nas/dge slong bcom pa de dag gis gros byas pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzhom
233b3('dul ba): bar bya'o zhes gsung bas re shig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci byas/bdag cag mnyan
233b4('dul ba): yod du dong na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyu ro zhes gros byaso//ji ltar 'dong bar bya/mtshan mo 'gebs pas
233b5('dul ba): 'dong zhing nyin mo thibs por zhugs te/'khra bar bya'o zhes/de dag gis khyim bdag la yang ma bltas par dong ngo //ji tsam na mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /dge slong dag nam
233b6('dul ba): kyigyi dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjesu brtson pa r-i gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i ga ma yo na rgyu ba mthong nas smras pa/gcer bu sgo byi dag khyed cag 'dir ci 'dod/
233b7('dul ba): 'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang ma yin la 'dug gnas kyang ma yin no//de dag gis smras pa tshe dang na gag/cag gcer bu dag ma yin no//'o na khyed su yin dge slong dag go/'di lta bu dge
234a1('dul ba): spyong yin nam/gang drug la rkun po dag gis bcom pa de dag ji lta bu yin//khyed cag ma chos su rgyas 'cha'o//chas 'cha'//dge 'dun 'char//cha dang ldan
234a2('dul ba): dwag 'ongs pa legaso 'das pa leg so zhes de dag gis sgo phye nas dge slong de dag 'jug tu bcug ste/de dag las las ni chos gos byan/la las ni sham thabs byin/la las ni rdul ldan
234a3('dul ba): byin/la las ni lhung bzed byin/la las ni chu tshags byon te/'gi bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad bsgo ba shar byas pa'i skyabs de/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
234a4('dul ba): dong /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi shes po lo gtsug lag khang gi sgo gya tsom du dbye bar mi bya s+t+waM/gal te 'ga' zhig mtshan mo sgo 'dod na/de'i ming dang rus dri bar bya zhing gal
234a5('dul ba): ting shes na sgo dbye bar bya zhing /ngo mi shes na sgo dbye bar mi bya'o//gzhan yang chos mnyan pa la bab po'i tshe/dge slong me la rtse ba bzhag par bya zhing /gal te chom rkun 'angs na gaN+DI
234a6('dul ba): 'on cig/ged+hI'u 'on cig/dus kyi 'khor lo 'on cig/snum sbyar dang /bdun pa dang /lbu ba dang gtur bu dang /rgyu cang dang /shur bu dang /lcags po dang /shur bu bre'u'on
234a7('dul ba): cig ces tsham nga mi bya'o//gzhin yang ngas dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos dge bci'i bar bya ste/dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis chos mnyan
234b1('dul ba): la bab pa'i cha/dge skos la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gi sgo bcad dam/so sor brtags sam/chos smra ba la gsol ba btab bam/bshang ba dang gci ba'i skyabs byi dor byas
234b2('dul ba): sam zhes dri bar bya'o//dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro//de nas
234b3('dul ba): chom rkun pas bcom pa'i dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag gis khyed cag la bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du bgo bsha' byas mod kyi 'on
234b4('dul ba): kyang da dung khyed cag chos gos dag gis brel gyis khyed cag khyim bdag gang gi gtsug lag khang du bcom par gyur pa'i khyim bdag de ni dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas de nyid
234b5('dul ba): kyi gtsug lag khang du deng cig dang /de nyid kyis khyed la chos gos dag gis mi brel bar byed par 'gyuraro//dge slong de dag mtha' cig tu dong ste/phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/tshe dang
234b6('dul ba): ldan pa dag tshangs pa chung bar spyod pa 'di dag zer ba ni bzang ste/bdag cag gis khyim bdag la ma bltas par 'ongs pas yang phyir de nyid du dong na des bdag cag la chos gos dag gis bgo
234b7('dul ba): bsha' byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang yod do zhes de dag yang phyir der dong ngo //de nas khyim bdag des mthong nas smras pa/'phags pa dag ci'i slad du khyed kyis bdag la mo gzigs par
235a1('dul ba): bzhud/dge slong de dag gis smras pa/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzho bar bya'o//zhes gsungs pas/des na bdag cag la blo byung
235a2('dul ba): ba re shig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya/bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci byas/bdag cag mnyan yod du dong na der bdag
235a3('dul ba): cag la tshangs pa tshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyu ro snyam nas/de'i phyir bdag cag mnyan yod du dong ngo //khyim bdag gis smras pa/'phags
235a4('dul ba): pa dag gal te bdag gi gtsug lag khang bcom pas/ci khyim na bdag dbang po'i rdzas dag kyang bcom snyam ma mo/'phags pa dag khyed cig gang gi slad du byon pa ni leg so zhes khyim
235a5('dul ba): bdag des yang rgya cher gus pa dang bcas pas mkho sa phab ste dge slong re re la yang yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum phu lo//chom rkun po de dag yang phyir 'ongs te gtsug lag khang gi sgra
235a6('dul ba): rdung bar byed pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis tshor nas de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dge g.yon can de dag nyid lhags kyis tshem ngam gyis shig ces/gaN+DI longs shig//gaN+DI'i
235a7('dul ba): ze'u dang /dus kyi 'khor lo dang /snam sbyar dang /bdun pa dang /lnga pa dang /gtur bu dang /rgya cang dang /shur bu dang /lcag pod dang /shur bu phre'u 'on cig ces tsham
235b1('dul ba): dam bya bar brtsams pa dang /g.yon can de dag skrag ste 'byer bar rnams pa dang /lhas tshig su bcad pa smras pa/legs gsung rkang gnyis gtso bo thub pa yis//nyan thos rnams
235b2('dul ba): kyi tsham dam gang bstan pa//tshe ma ngam rab brtson pa dag mchog yin gyi//g.yon can ga yul la sngar bgo ljon pa//lnga brgya dag ni de lta ma yin no//g.yon can de dag la dge slong
235b3('dul ba): gi rgyus shes pa des smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag ci'i phyir 'byer bar byed/de dag gis smras pa/khyod nyid na re 'di na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug cu po dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon
235b4('dul ba): sha stag yino zhes zer bas/ji ltar mi 'bro su rung /gzhon yang bdag cog gis gaN+DI zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshon de lta bu dag gi ming ni sngon len 'ga' yang ma thos so des smras
235b5('dul ba): pa/de dag ni mtshon ma yin no//'o na de dag tso yin re zhig kaN+DI zhes bya ba ni/de dag gi brdung ba'o//gaN+DI'i the'u zhes bya ba ni gang gis rdung bar byed pa'o//dus kyi 'khor lon
235b6('dul ba): dus yongasu gcod par byed pa'o//snam sbyar dang /'dun pa dang /lnga pa zhes bya ba de dag ni chos gos dag gi ming ngo //gtur bu zhes bya bya ni gang du de dag gzhug pa'o//rgya cang
235b7('dul ba): dang /shur bu dang /lcog pod dang /shur bu dre'u zhes bye ba de dag gi ska rags kyi ming yin gyi/khyed cag ma sbyar bar yang phyir 'ding la go zhom par bya'o zhes smras nas/de dag
236a1('dul ba): yang phyir log ste/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyi ya gang gtsugs te 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /den rgan zhugs shig mel tse bar gzhag pa des
236a2('dul ba): chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'jog pa mthong nas/rga ni zhugs des bsams pa/g.yon can 'di dag ni gang dag gis bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos phrogs te sgren mor bzhan
236a3('dul ba): pa dag yin gyis/gal te 'di dag la btang snyoms byas na/yang 'di dag gis bdag cag gi lhung bzed dang rmogs phrogs te sgren mo bzhag par 'gyur bas 'di dge bsdigs
236a4('dul ba): par bya'o//snyam nas/rgan zhubs des dal bus khrod kyis khad kyis song ste/chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de'i mgor gan+d+hi'i phangs pa dang /de'i glad pazhom nus/de bstan pa
236a5('dul ba): drag pos phog pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen nas tshegs chen pos babs te/cung zhig tu song ba dang /dus la bab po//rgan zhugs des chom rkun po chom
236a6('dul ba): rkun pa zhes ku tsho'i spyi phyung ba dang /dge slong rnams kyis chos nyan pa bcad de/khang seng du 'dzegs nas/smras pa/chom rkun pa de dag gad dong /rgan zhugs kyis smras
236a7('dul ba): pe/phyogs 'dir yi ge bcug te/'dzegs pa na kho bos bsdigs nas bye ro//dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/gal te byar legaso zhes de dag babs te/ji tsam na
236b1('dul ba): mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor so sor brtags par brtsams te/chom rkun pa de dag 'dzegs par gyur pa'i phyogs de gang yin zhes de dag gis so sor brtags pa na
236b2('dul ba): khrag mthong ngo //de dag khrag rje su dong ba dang /chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon bsad pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bslab pa 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pas skrag ste smra bar brtsams pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag
236b3('dul ba): bdag cag sngon ma bcom gyis bdag cag gang gis pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung bas da ni bcom par gyur to zhes de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom
236b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed cag la ni ltung ba med de/yang dge slong gis ci nas kyang brdzun pas bsnun par bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis 'phang bar mi bya bar 'di lta glo 'am/rgyab
236b5('dul ba): log su 'phang bar bya zhing bsdigs pa bskyed pa'i phyir tsham ngam bya'o//dge slong gis ci nas kyang bsnun pas bsnun pa bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis 'phen par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyuraro//
236b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so//mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
236b7('dul ba): rlangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bor byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan sems can zhugs
237a1('dul ba): par gyur nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag
237a2('dul ba): de nye du zad par gyur cing nor dang longs spyod kyang zad par gyu re/de'i chung ma yang dus la brub nas des bu la smras pa/da kho bos ni rgas pa'i gnas sgrub su nor sgrub tu 'gro mi nus kyis rab tu
237a3('dul ba): 'byung du 'gror//bus smras pa yab gal te de lta na bdag rab tu 'byung ngo //bu lig so zhes des khye'u de dri de de rgyul byed kyi tshal du song nas/dge slong gi drung du song ste/rkang pa gnyis
237a4('dul ba): phyog tsho nas smras pa/'bigs pa bdag rib tu 'byung bar 'tsho mo//dge slong des smras pa/ khye'u 'di yang rongab tu 'byung ngam/'phags pa rab tu 'byung ngo //dge slong de khye'u
237a5('dul ba): drido'adod pas de bu dang bcas te rab tu byung ngo //chos nyid kyis na rgan pa'i mtha' nas rnyed pa 'thob la gzhon pa'i mtha' nas la su bsgo ba yin pas/rgan shugs kyi bu rtag tu la su sgo
237a6('dul ba): byed nas/des pa la smras pa/yib bdag cag gnyis gAng cung bad zil gyis non pa de thams cad zos pa nyung ba las gyur pa legs kyis bzhengs shig dang /sgrol cig gnyis yul
237a7('dul ba): gozhan du bzhud la thos pa gzung bar bgyi'o//rgan zhugs kyis smras pa/bu legs kyis 'dong ngo zhes/de gnyis yul gzhan du dong ngo //'on kyang gzhon pa'i mtha' nyid nas las
237b1('dul ba): su bsgobs/de gnyis son ma thag kho nar la su bsgo bar bsgos pa dang /bus rgan zhugs la smras pa/yab mnyan yod na la su bsgo ba mchi su lags kyang /de na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje
237b2('dul ba): mngon sum du bzhugs shing /dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byaso//che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar gru bo zhes shes pa brda sprod pa yang
237b3('dul ba): thos par 'gyur/rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin tu dad cing /btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /rnying pa dang /dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang /
237b4('dul ba): ri dgas 'dzin gyi ma dang /gzhan yang dad pa can mang du mchis pas don zang zing gi longs spyod dang /chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang mchis kyis der bzhud do zhes smras nas/de gnyis
237b5('dul ba): cing gar ljong su 'khod nas mnyan yod gal ba der rgyu zhing do ba na/mthur gyis rgyu zhing 'dod rje/mnyan yod du phyir phyin to//ji tshem na rgyal byed kyi tshol dang nye bar phyin pa na gar+b+ha
237b6('dul ba): yang brdungs nas bus smras pa/yang gtsug lag khang dugaN+DI brdungs kyis myur du myur bar bzhud do//rgan zhugs des rgan lnga 'gyur bas shin tu ngal zhing 'gro mi nus pos de dal bus
237b7('dul ba): 'gro ba na/bus de'i gnyil ba nas bzung ste phul ba dang /rgan zhugs des myur ba myur bar 'phro bar brtsam so//bus bsams pa thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig yin gyis yang dbul bar
238a1('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/bus des rgan zhugs de yang de bzhin du phul ba dang /rgan zhugs de sal kha bub tu skyel nas de'i kha phang los glegs pa'i sas gang ste dus la bab bo//
238a2('dul ba): bu des ngud mos btab ste rgan zhugs kyi ro de lam gyi mtha' cig tu bor ro//de nas bu des lhung bzed dang chos gos khyi ra te/rgyal byed kyi tshul du song ba dang /dge slong rnams kyis de
238a3('dul ba): mthong nas smras pa/rgan zhugs kyi bu 'ongs pa leg so 'ongs pa leg so//khyod kyi rgan zhugs de ga la 'dug ces dris pa dang /gsar bu des ngu bar brtsam so//dge slong rnams
238a4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/bu ci'i phyir ngu bar byed/gsar bu des smras pa/bdag gi rgan zhugs de dus la bab bo//dge slong de dag gis smras pa/bu 'du byed thams cad kyi chos de lta
238a5('dul ba): bu yin la/khyod ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin pas/mya ngan ma byed cig/gsar phus smras pa/de bdag gos bsad do//dge slong de
238a6('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/bu 'o na khyod kyis mtsham ma med pa'i las gang yin pa yang byas la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba gang yin pa yang byung bas yun ring por sems can dpyang ba/
238a7('dul ba): chen po ma nir med par gnas par 'gyur bas/de ngu ba'i rig so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis/
238b1('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de/yang dge slong lam du zhugs pas dge slong lam gyis dub pa dbul bar mi bya'o//ngas dge slong lam du zhugs pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i
238b2('dul ba): chos dag bca' bar bya ste/dge slong lam du zhugs pas dge slong lam gyis dub pa ngal sor gzhug par bya/chos gos gsum drong /lhung bzed dang /chu tshogs dang /lhung bzed kyi
238b3('dul ba): snod dang /bar bu snod kyi rdzas blang bar bya'o//dus shes par bya ste/gal te 'gro nus na de lta na legs/gal te 'gro me nus na ches sngar song ste/lhung bzed bkru bar bya/gos
238b4('dul ba): gzhag par bya/snod dag byin len byed du bcug nas so sor brtag par bya'o//gal te 'ong mi nus na zas mnos te bsu bar bya'o//dus ma yin na skom gyis bsu bar bya'o//dge slong
238b5('dul ba): lam du zhugs pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed 'gal tshabs can du 'gyu ro////dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/
238b6('dul ba): the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rgan zhugs kyi blo 'dis pa srog dang bral yang mtshams ma mchis pa'i kha ni ma tho ba kyang ma re go laNapham
238b7('dul ba): par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba yang ma byung ba la gzigs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis pa
239a1('dul ba): srog dang phral yang /mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas ma reg ste de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das bya'i dus na/ri brag shig na btso blag mkhan shig
239a2('dul ba): 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur
239a3('dul ba): spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma las bu byung nas/de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to//ji tsamo dus gzhan zhig na re brags der dus ston byung nas/de la gos bkru ba shal bya ba
239a4('dul ba): mong po dag byung ba dang /des bu la smras pa/bu gos mang po dag bkru ba shal bya dgos pas kho bo khyim du song ste zan za mi nus kyi tshur shog gos dag khyer te 'dong ngo //phyir song la
239a5('dul ba): zas khyer te shog shig/de bu dang lhan cig gos dag khyer te song ngo //bu phyir song ste zan khyer te 'ongs nas/des zan zas te smras pa/bu kho bo rol gyis nya lo//khyod re shig
239a6('dul ba): gos dag bkru ba shal gyis shig/bus smras pa de ltar bgyi'o//btso blag mkhan de phyogs gcig tu glos phab ste/gnyid lag go/de spyi cher zhis yin pas de'i mgo la sbrang bu
239a7('dul ba): chags//dzi tsam na btso blag mkhan gyi bu des gos dag bkru ba shal byas nas pa'i gno du song ba dang /ba'i mgo la sbrang bu chags pa mthong nas des spyad par brtsams pa dang //
239b1('dul ba): bu brag gis myos pa/'phur du ma btub nas/bu de mi bzod pa skyes te bsams pa/sbrang bu 'dis bdag gi pha gson gzhin du khrag 'thung bar byed kyis gsad par bya'o snyam nas bu des de la spyang
239b2('dul ba): leb kyis bsnun pa dang /sbrang bu de ni bros te song gis pha'i glang po zhom nas de dus la bab pa dang /lhas tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/dgra bo blo gros ldan pa mchog yin te//mdza' bshes blo
239b3('dul ba): gros bral ba de lta min//blo gros chung ngus sbrang bu gsad snyam nas//tho bas pha yi glad pa bcom pa gyur//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na btso blag mkhan gang yin pa de
239b4('dul ba): ni rgan zhugs 'di nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus na btso blag mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs kyi bu 'di nyid yin te/'dis de'i tshe yang srog dang phral yang mtshams med pa'i kha na tho
239b5('dul ba): bas ma reg la/'dis da ltar yang pha srog dang phral yang mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas kyang ma reg la/bam par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba yang ma byung ngo //las dang po pa dang /smyos pa dang //
239b6('dul ba): sems 'khrugs pa dang /tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do//pham par 'gyur ba gsum pa rdzogaso////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi 'gram
239b7('dul ba): na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzungs na bzhugaso//de'i tshe na nya ba lnga brgya chu klung yid dong ldan brtan cing 'khod do//de dag la rgya mo spyod pa dang /spyod pa chen mo zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod do//
240a1('dul ba): de dag lan 'ga' ni rgya mo spyod pa 'jud par byed la/lan 'ga' ni spyod pa chen mo 'jud par byed de/gang gi tshe nya dag nyo ba med pa de'i tshe na rgya mo spyod pa 'jud par byed la//
240a2('dul ba): gang gi tshe nya dag nyo ba yod pa de'i tshe ni spong ba chen mo 'jud par byed do//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can du dus ston byung nas/de dag gis rgya mo gnyis ka bcug ste/nyis bcu
240a3('dul ba): lnga bcus ni rgya mo spyod pa bcug/nyis brgya lnga bcus ni spyod pa chen po bcugo/gang dag gis rgya mo spyod pa btsug pa de dag gis nya dang /rus sbrul dang /sbal ba dang /chu srin byis
240a4('dul ba): pa gsod dang /nyi khya ba la sogs mang po dag 'di lta ste/dper na til dang /'bras thug po che dang /rgya shug dang /rgyu sran la sogs pa bzhin du phung po chen por rnam pa re bro nog/
240a5('dul ba): gang dag gis rgya mo spyod pa chen po bcug pa de dag gis ni rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa chu srin nya'i rigs bong tshod chen po nyal ba zin nas/de dag gis de
240a6('dul ba): drang bar brtsamaso//de dag gis drangs pa na de sad nas nya ba nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag dang /rgya ma spyod pa chen mo khyer te/rgyun phyog su zhugaso//nya pa de dag gis nya pa nyis brgya
240a7('dul ba): lde bcu po gzhan dag la shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen mo dang /bdag cag khyer gyis ra mnga' log shig ces byas//de dag gis thos nas nya ba nyis brgya lnga bcu po gzhan
240b1('dul ba): dag kyang lhags te/de nyid la rub pa dang /dros nya ba lnga brgya dang /rgya mo spyod pa chen ma khyer to rgyun phyog su zhugs nas gzung bar la nus//skyabs med pa de dag gis kun tu shes ldan dag
240b2('dul ba): rgyu mi spyod pa chen mo dang bdag cag khyer gyis grogs gyis shig ces ro mda' bzlog pa dang /las ma mthong ba'i mi ba lang rdzi dge dang shing shin thun dag dang rtsa thun dag dang /lam
240b3('dul ba): gyis 'tsho ba dag dang /lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag dang /gzhan yang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag log nas/de dag gis smras pa dang /rnam par smras pa dag gis
240b4('dul ba): rgya mo ral ba dang /rab tu ral pas chu srin de ru chu skam la phyung //de la mgo bcwa brgyad dang mig sum cu rtsa drug yod de//ri'i mgo lnga la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra/la l-i ni rta'i mgo
240b5('dul ba): 'dra/la la ni rnga mo'i mgo dang /bong bu'i mgo dang /baM lang gi mgo dang /spre'u yi mgo dang /seng ge'i mgo dang /stag gi mgo dang /dom gyi mgo dang /dred mo'i mgo
240b6('dul ba): dang /glang phyi mgo dang /byi la'i mgo dang ra'i mgo dang /lug mgo dang /ri dgas kyi mgo dang /ma he'i mgo dang /phag gi mgo dang /phyi'i mgo 'dra'o//kun du
240b7('dul ba): chu klung yid 'ong ldan pa'i nya bo lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung med 'ong ldan du zhugs pa'i chu srin nya'i rigs bong tshod chen po zhig rgya mo spyod pa chen mos zin te/chu nas
241a1('dul ba): la phyung zhing de la mgo bco brgyad dang /mig sum cu rtsa drug yod do zhes sgras khyab par gyur to//de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag chu klung yid
241a2('dul ba): 'od ldan gyi 'gram du lhags te/kha cig ni ltad mo skyes par gyur/kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gso bskal par gyur to//rdzogs byed la sogs pa'i ston pa drug po
241a3('dul ba): yangs pa can na rten cing gnas pa dag kyang ltad mo skyes te der lhag so//skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang ya mtshan skyes te mi tshug su rtog cing /shes ldan dag 'di'i mgo la la ni
241a4('dul ba): glang po che'i mgo 'dra la de nas rtog par byed/de'i mgo la la ni khyi'i bor gyi mgo 'dra la de nas rtog par byed do zhes kyang zer ro//de'i skab su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
241a5('dul ba): rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /ma gzigs pa dang /ma rig pa dang /rnam par mi khyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang
241a6('dul ba): ldan pa/'jig rten la phan par bzhugs pa/bsrang ba gcig pu ba/nyag gcig dpa' ba/gnyis pa med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong
241a7('dul ba): gis bzhugs pa/rigs pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/chu bo
241b1('dul ba): bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring ba nas yongasu sbyangs pa mdzad pa/ma 'jigs pa bzhes
241b2('dul ba): bstongs pa mi mnga' ba/yan lag lta spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas
241b3('dul ba): pa drug gis gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi phyug pa/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas
241b4('dul ba): pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba la khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan
241b5('dul ba): gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams par 'gyur/gang ni 'phel bar 'gyur/gang ni gnod par gyur/gang
241b6('dul ba): ni nyam nga bar gyur/gang ni mi bde bar gyur/gang ni gnod pa dang /nyam nga ba dang /mi bde bar gyur/gang ni ngan song la gzhol/gang ni ngan song le 'bab/gang ni ngan
241b7('dul ba): song la bab/ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste/mtho ris dang thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya//
242a1('dul ba): 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya/gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i jig
242a2('dul ba): rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma skyed pa ni bskyed par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni yongasu smin par bya/yong su smin pa gang ni
242a3('dul ba): rnam par grol+la bya zhes mkhyen pa gzigs pa 'jug/smras pa chu srin nags kyi gdug can pa//dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi//sangs rgyas 'dul la byams pa ni//dus lnga
242a4('dul ba): 'da' bar mi 'gyuraro//ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gaN+DIg pu pa//rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar//de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dul ba'i skye bo la//rtog par mdzad cing de srog
242a5('dul ba): srung bar mdzad//kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' thugs rje yi//gzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste//srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni//rab byas be'u la byam
242a6('dul ba): pa'i ba bzhino//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa chu srin nyi'i rigs gnod pa dang nyam nga ba mi bde ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni//sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin gyis
242a7('dul ba): ngas chu srin nyi'i rigs 'di la rten te gdul bar gyur pa'i rgyal mo chen mo drang bar byas//de'i phyir chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du 'gro'o snyam mo//sangs rgyas bcom
242b1('dul ba): ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa gson zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rje su thugs brtse bas dus dang dus son dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa dang
242b2('dul ba): dud 'gro rgyu ba dang /yi dgas rgyu ba dang /lha rgyu ba dang /ljongs rgyu ba dang /chu klung rgyu ba dang /ri rgyu ba dang /dur khrod rgyu ba dang /gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs pas/'dir ni
242b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/klung rgyur gshegs par gzhed nas 'dzub pa mdzad do//chos nyid kyis ni gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i
242b4('dul ba): che na zhal na 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod kha dang /shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/kha cig ni 'og logasu dong /kha cig
242b5('dul ba): ni steng log su 'dong bas/gang dag 'og log su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus gzhom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po
242b6('dul ba): dang tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /so thams thams dang /kye hud zer ba dang /a chu zer ba dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar
242b7('dul ba): gas pa dang /pad+ma lterags pa chen po dong ste/sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang dag gi dmyal ba de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te/'bab par byed la/sems
243a1('dul ba): can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bad par byed do//des sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di
243a2('dul ba): snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so//de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar
243a3('dul ba): mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la/gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/'di ltar sems can sngon
243a4('dul ba): ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam du semaso//de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong
243a5('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/gang bu bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyis nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do//gang dag steng logasu dong ba de dag ni
243a6('dul ba): rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /'thob bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na
243a7('dul ba): 'don dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dag dang /dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang /bsod nams skyes
243b1('dul ba): dang /'bras bu che dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nam snang dang /shin tu 'thong dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag
243b2('dul ba): med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog par byed cing tshigasu bcad pa gnyis po brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya//'dam bu'i khyim la gleng chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde
243b3('dul ba): ni gzhom par bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod par//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba//skyo ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur//zhes bya ba yang smraso//de nas
243b4('dul ba): 'od zer de dag skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin smad bzhin du rje su 'dong ste/de lo gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i lung ston
243b5('dul ba): par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logasu nub par 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun log su nub par 'gyur/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston
243b6('dul ba): par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na na long bu ri nub par 'gyur/yi dgasu skye bar lung ston par bzhed
243b7('dul ba): na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston po ra bzhed na ni phyag mthil
244a1('dul ba): g.yon par nub par 'gyur/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni
244a2('dul ba): bAr nub par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/bla na
244a3('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom
244a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi lte bar nub bo//de nas tshe dang pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
244a5('dul ba): rgyurgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mches/rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/rkyen ni gang lags/tshigasu bcad pa yang gsol pa/kha dog sna tshogs
244a6('dul ba): stong gis bkra ba yi//tshogs rnams zhal gyi spros nas byung gyur te//de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa//gnyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no//rgod bral zhum dang rgyags
244a7('dul ba): pa rab spangs pa/sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal bdag thul byed rgyu ma mchis par/rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mjed//de slad bstan pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas//thub
244b1('dul ba): pa khyam chog dge sbyong skye dbang po//nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la//the tsom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol//tsha chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//sangs
244b2('dul ba): rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum me ston//bstan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad do//skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de de bzhin no//
244b3('dul ba): de de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyis/kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la
244b4('dul ba): dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyis//khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs gcig chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig/
244b5('dul ba): ces bsgo shig/tshe dang ldan pa kun dgra'i bas btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshol zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams li smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das
244b6('dul ba): chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyis/khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig//'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/bam
244b7('dul ba): po bcu gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba dang ldan pa/zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ljon pa/thul
245a1('dul ba): ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/'dod chag dang bralab 'khor 'dod chags drang bral ba dang ldan pa/mdzes pa 'khor mdzes//
245a2('dul ba): ba dang ldan pa/khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ga glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ga/seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongasu
245a3('dul ba): bskor gangang po'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor gan mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/smyan
245a4('dul ba): pamakhas pa lhur nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/dpa' bo ltar rA d+ha'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor gas mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ded dpon
245a5('dul ba): ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba tshang dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/'khor los
245a6('dul ba): sgra bu lhur bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshegs kyis yongasu bskor gnyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gis tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/yul 'khor srung
245a7('dul ba): ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor gnod sbyin ltar
245b1('dul ba): gnod sbyin gyi tshogs gyis yongasu bskor ga thag bzangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/brgya byin ltar sum cu pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/tshangs pa ltar tshangs
245b2('dul ba): ris kyi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ga dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba dang /spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/chu gter ltar ting nge ba/sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar
245b3('dul ba): dreglegs pa dang bral ba/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs por brgyan po/dpe byad bzangs po brgyad cus su rnam par mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gi gzugs can brgyan pa
245b4('dul ba): nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsuM
245b5('dul ba): dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /rlangs pa dang /mig chen dang /ma 'gags pa dang /shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /'od srung dang /kun dga' bo dang /nam gru la
245b6('dul ba): sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/chu klung yid 'ong ldan ga la ba der rgyu zhing gsheg so//'khor des thag rnying po kho na nas bcom ldan
245b7('dul ba): 'das/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang ma bdag ma dang pa de dag ni dge sbyong go'u tu ma ltad mo dang bral lo zhes grag na/de yang ltad mo skyes te chu srin nya'i rigs
246a1('dul ba): blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongaso zhes zer ro//gang drug dad pa dang ldan pa de dag ni mya dad pa de dag la shes lhun dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ltad mau dang bral
246a2('dul ba): gakhon yin te/bcom ldan 'das chu srin nya'i rigs las brtsams te/spyi do'i tshogs chen po la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos cung zhig ston par bzhi gor mchago zhes zer zhing 'di
246a3('dul ba): skad ces kyang smra so//thub pa ltad mo bral ba'i dgongs ldan pa//ltad mo med la skye ngan don med smra//gzhan phan de la gzhol ba'i rgyal ba 'di//lus can phan phyir nges par 'dir gshegs
246a4('dul ba): de nas 'khor des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'phral kho nas mngon par longs te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas/yab dang /yum dang /mkhan po
246a5('dul ba): dang /slob dpon dang bla ma dang bla ma'i gnas lta bu dge la mngon par bzhengs mdzad mdzad pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor de'i dbus su gshegs te/dge slong gi dge 'dun
246a6('dul ba): gyi gong du gdan gshams pa nyid la bzhugs so//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nya pa lnga brgya po de dag la bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs dag re shig khyed cag ni nyes par byas
246a7('dul ba): pa'i las byed pa yin te/des na da lta nya ba'i skye gnas dman par skyes shing khyed cag da ltar drag shul can/lag pa khrag gis gos pa/nyams pa dang rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa/gzhan
246b1('dul ba): gyisag 'phrog pa/gzhan gyi sdug gcod pas 'cha bar byed do//'di nas shi 'phos na khyed cig gi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/skye ban cir 'gyur/tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur/de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan
246b2('dul ba): 'das bdag cag gis ci zhog bgyi ba bka' stsal du gos la/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal ga nya dang ru sA la dang sbal ba dang mu srin byis po gsod dang /nya byi ba la sogs chu nas bton pa 'di
246b3('dul ba): dag zong shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin btang bar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bko' sprul pa'i dus kyi mjug phogasu de dag btang ngo //de nas
246b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas ci nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa/nya dang ru sbal dang stsal pa dang chu srin byis pa gsod dang /nya khyi ba la sogs pa'i srog chags 'di
246b5('dul ba): dag chu ji lta ba kho na bzhin du rgyu klung yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rje su dran zhing mo'i skud brjod par 'gyur la/nga dang thabs gcig smra bar
246b6('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mi na bar 'du bye ba mengan par 'du bya'o snya ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tso nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa nyu drung du skal dang sprul pa dang /chu
246b7('dul ba): srini byis pa gsod dang /nye khyi ba la sogs po'i srog chags de dag chu ji lta ba kho na bzhin du chu srin yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rje dran
247a1('dul ba): zhing ma'i spyad brjod par 'gyur la/bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do//de nas
247a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin nya'i rigs la bka' stsal pa/bu khyod ser skya yin nam/bcom ldan 'das bdag ser skyal gis//bu khyod ser skya yin nam/bde bar gshegs pa bdag ser
247a3('dul ba): skya lag so//bu khyod la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa yod dam/bcom ldan 'das mchis lag so//bu khyod la ngag dang yid gnyis kyis nyes par spyod pa yod dam/bde bar gshegs pa mchis
247a4('dul ba): so/bu khyod kyis lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyam su myong ngam/bcom ldan 'das nyam su myong ngo //bu khyod kyis ngag dang yid kyi nyos par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su
247a5('dul ba): myong ngamo//bde bar gshegs pa nyam su myong ngo //'o na khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/bdag gi ma lag so//de gang du skyes/sems can dmyal ba rnam su'o//khyod gang du skyes/dud
247a6('dul ba): 'gro ro//ji snyam du sems khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o//bde bar gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba rnamasu'o
247a7('dul ba): zhes gsol nas du ba la zhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa bka' stsal pa/khyod ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas skyes//mi khom zhugs par gyur pa la//da ltar ngas
247b1('dul ba): kyang ci byar med//don med dus pas ci la phan//thugs rje ldan rgyu ljang la ni//legs par sems na dad gyis dang //dud 'gru' skya 'dir chags bral zhing //de nas mtha ras 'gro bar gyur//des bcom ldan
247b2('dul ba): 'das la sems dad par byas nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de la bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o//chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o//mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes
247b3('dul ba): tshig gsum gyis chos bstan to//de nas 'khor de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas/shes ldan dge bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas sngon gyi skye ba dran par byas shing mi'i skad kyang brjod par byed
247b4('dul ba): la bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig smra bar byed pa 'di su zhig yin//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsten par dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba yin pas/bdag cag gis bcom ldan
247b5('dul ba): 'das la don de zhu bar ni mi nus pa'i bdag cag 'phags pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste/phyin nas 'phags pa kun dga' bo la don de zhu bar bya zhing /'phags pa kun dga' bos bdag cag la
247b6('dul ba): ji skad lung ston par 'gyur ro//de nyon bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes ze ro//de nas 'khor de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
247b7('dul ba): smras//'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas/sngon gyi skye ba dran par bgyis shing mo'i skad kyang rjod par bgyid la/bcom ldan 'das dang thabs gcig smra bar bgyid pa
248a1('dul ba): 'di su zhig lags/kun dga' bos smras pashes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das nyid la don de zhus shig/'bugs pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
248a2('dul ba): ni bsten par bka' ba dang /bzod par dka' ba lags pas/bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar rngo mo thog leg so//shes ldan dag kho bo la yod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
248a3('dul ba): rnams bstan par dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba yin pas kho bos kyang bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar mi nus mod kyi/'on kyang khyod kyi don du zhu bar bya'o//zhes smras nas/bcom ldan
248a4('dul ba): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go//mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
248a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pas/sngon gyi skye ba dran pa bgyis shing mi'i skad kyang rjed par bgyis la/bcom ldan 'das
248a6('dul ba): dang thabs gcig smra bar bgyid pa 'di su zhig lags/kun dga' bo 'di ni chu srin nya'i rigs yin no//kun dge' bo khyod chu sin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba las brtsams te///
248a7('dul ba): chos dang ldan pa'i gtam nyan par 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis chu sri ni nye'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba las brtsams te//dge slong rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs la chos dang ldan
248b1('dul ba): ba'i bka' stsal bar gyur ma/bcom ldan 'das las thos nas dge slong rnams dang skye ba'i tshogs dag 'dzin par 'gyur bas//bcom ldan 'das de ni dus lag so//bde bar gshegs pa de ni dus
248b2('dul ba): lag so//kun dga' ba de'i phyir nyon le legs par rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o//kun dga' bo sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la/skyes dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa
248b3('dul ba): na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhab su ldan pa khride bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba
248b4('dul ba): bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer bA ra na se nau drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na
248b5('dul ba): nye bar brten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe grong khyer bA ra na sen rgyal po kri kri zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/rgyas pa bde galo legs pa/skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang gi 'thob mo dang 'thab pa dang /
248b6('dul ba): ngag dang nang khrug rab tu zhi ga chom rkun dang mu ge dang /nad dang bral gas lu dang bu ram dang shing gi phreng ba dang /ba lang dang ma te phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal
248b7('dul ba): bos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcu'o//de nas shed bu gsang tshig 'dod pa/gsang tshig la tshol ba zhig yul dbus nas lho lam du song ngo //de na bram ze rig byed dang /rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha
249a1('dul ba): rol tu son pa/yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis rton par gyur pa zhig 'dug nas/shed bu de bram ze de'i drung du song ste phyin nas/zhi ba dang spyod lam zhi bas mgo/
249a2('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal te/mtha' gcig tu 'dug go//de nas bram ze des shad bu de la 'ongs pa leg so//zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad nas smras pa/kye shed bu khyod ga los 'ongs ci zhig
249a3('dul ba): 'dod /shed bus smras pa/bdag yul dbus nas mchis te/mkhan po'i zhabs la sri bzhu bgyid par 'tsho lo//ci zhig gi phyir rog byed klag pa'i slad du'o//shed bu legs kyis de bzhin
249a4('dul ba): gyis shig/de ni bram zes bya ba yin no//shed bu des bram ze'i drung du rig byed klag par bya bar brtsam so//shad bu rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni 'di yin te/gang gi tshe mi klog par gyur pa da'i
249a5('dul ba): tshe na lan 'ga' ni chu ngog suM nye reg byed du 'dong ngo //len 'ga' ni grong khyor ltar 'dong ngo //lan 'ga' ni yang sreg shing thur 'dong ngo //ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dag mi klog ber gyur
249a6('dul ba): nas/de'i tshe de dag yam seg shing thur dong ba dang /de dag la lam gyi bar du bar skabs kyi gtam rjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byang ste/kye kud sa'i rigs dag/bad sa'i rigs dag/shan de la'i
249a7('dul ba): rigs dag/ba ra dwa dza'i rigs dag/lnga pa'i rigs dag/nye lnga'i rigs dag je khyed cag las gang ni yul ga las 'ongs pa dri bar bya'o//de na shad pu cig gis smras pa/kho bo ni yul shar
249b1('dul ba): na so//gzhan zhig gis smras pa/kho bo ni lho lam na so//yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa kho bo ni nub kyis na so//yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa/kho bo ni byed lam naso//shed bu des smras pa/kho bo
249b2('dul ba): ni yul dbus na so//de dag gis smras pashes ldan dag bdag cag gis yul thams cad mthong zhing thos nas yul dbus ma mthong ma thos so//shar ni blo can gnas pa ste//lto la man
249b3('dul ba): ni yon byed 'i dug/nub kyi yul na phri ma can//byang leman ni tshig rtsub bo//zhes tshigasu bcad pa yang smraso//de nas dris pashed pu yul dbus ci 'dra/shes ldan dag sul dbus ni yul
249b4('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog yin te/sa lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa/slongs mo bri brgyas khyab pa/dbus pa'i skye bos gang ga mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bos spangs
249b5('dul ba): pa/skye bo mkhas pas bsten pa/de na chu klung gang ga kha rdza dang bsod nams dang /bkra shis dang gtsang ba dang /gtsang ba nyid kyi gan su grags pa/'gram gnyis nas rlan 'phyo ba/drang song rnams
249b6('dul ba): kyi sti gnas shes bya ba chu dgur bcwa brgyad 'bab pa yod de/der drang srong rnams kyis bka' thub spyad na/rang gi lus nyid kyis mtho re su 'dong ba yin no//kye shed bu don mjal gyis gzhan
249b7('dul ba): 'di 'dra'o//yul dbus na mkhas par bgrang ba dag yod dam/shes ldan dag kho bos dang po nyid nas/shes ldan dag yul dbus ni dbus pa'i skye bos ga ga mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bos
250a1('dul ba): spangs pa/skye bo mkhas pas bsten pa'o zhes ma smras sam/shed bu khyod kyis de skad smraso//shed bu yul dbus na 'di lta ste dper na bdag cag gi mkhan po dang 'dra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog
250a2('dul ba): de lta bu dag yod dam/shes ldan dag yul dbus na bdag cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gi gdong du lta bar yang mi nus pa snyan par smra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod do//shed pu de dag
250a3('dul ba): la de lta de ltar yul dbus kyi bsdogs pa brjod pa dang /'di ltar de dag thams cad yul dbus su 'dong 'dod par gyur to//de nas shed bu de dag gis yam sreg shing dag btsal te/ya ma
250a4('dul ba): sreg shing gis khur thogs nas bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/yam sreg shing gi khur mtha' cig tu bzhag ste/bram ze de ga la ba dong ste phyin pa dang /bram ze de la 'di skad
250a5('dul ba): ces smra so//mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/shed pu 'dis ci nas kyang bdag cag thams cad yul dbus su mchi 'tshal bar gyur pa de ltar yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod do//bram ze des
250a6('dul ba): smras pa/bu dag ci snyed thos pa de snyed bgrod par bya ba yin nam/'di ltar yul dag ni thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas mnyan par bya'i bgrod par ni mi bya'o//mkhan po shed bu 'di'i
250a7('dul ba): mchid nas yul dbus na bdag cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gi gdong du lta bar mi nus pa snyam par smra ba smra ba'i khyu chog de lta bu dag mchis so zhes mchi'o//bu dag ci kho bo na
250b1('dul ba): sa'i steng na kho bo gcig pu kho na smra ba yon gyi smra ba gzhan 'ga' yang med do zhes zer rama?/sa ni rin po che mang po 'dzin pa yin pa/sa gzhi ni mdzes pa mdzes pa dag gis gang ba yin no//mkhan par
250b2('dul ba): shig yul de yang mthong bar 'gyur zhing chung gsu nye reg kyang bgyi/smra ba'i khyu mchog de dag la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi/rgol ba dag kyang tshar bcad par bgyi/rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par
250b3('dul ba): bgyi/rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bgyis/bdag cag yul dbus su mchi'o//bram ze de slob ma rje su chags pa dang bcas pa dang 'khor nyung ba yin pas/des shed bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//bu//
250b4('dul ba): dag gal te de lta na g.yang gzhi dag dang shing shun dag dang dbyug gu dag dang /glugs gzar dag dang nga /gzar dag dang ril ba dag long shig dang yul dbus su 'dong ngo //de dag gis de dag
250b5('dul ba): blangs nas bram ze de shed pu de dag dang lhan cig yul dbusu 'phags pa dang /des rgol ba kha cig tshar bcad de rgol ba'i shing rta la sbyor bar byed/kha cig ni mgor thal ba'i bum pa dag gis
250b6('dul ba): bsnan/kha cig ni 'phong gi dpong sar khwa bzhin du thag ring po nas yongasu spong bar byed/kha cig ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /ba don dag gyis bsu bar byed/kha cig ni slob ma nyid tu khas len
250b7('dul ba): bar byed ci de mthar gyis grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /dbye tshangs dang /tshong rda la dag tu rgol ba 'dul zhing bar na por phyin to//bram ze des bsams pa bdag gis ci'i phyir
251a1('dul ba): rtsa ba sbyangs te yal ga dang mdab ma dang lo ma la nyug par bya/rgol ba gang dag dang mkhas par bgrang ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po dang nye ba yin gyis bdag
251a2('dul ba): kyang rgyal po'i gan du 'gro'o snyam nas/bram ze de rgyal po kri kI ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po kri kri la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te mtha' cig tu 'dug go//mtha' cig tu 'dug nas rgyal po
251a3('dul ba): kri kri la 'di skad smraso//lha bdag la bla ma las yi ge nyung bre shig blangs pa mchis te de'i slad du lha'i spyad snga rgol bdag dang lhan cigo bka' 'chid rnam par gtan la dbab par 'tshe lo//rgyal pos
251a4('dul ba): blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag nga'i yul na bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gautan la 'bebs par byed pa'i rgol ba 'ga' yod dam/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/wAr
251a5('dul ba): brags che ge mo zhig na bram ze ser skya zhi ba zhes bgyi ba rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/zhugs lta bu'i shes pas rang gi smra ba gsal bar bgyid pa/gzhan gyi sgra
251a6('dul ba): ba tshar gcod par rngo thog pa zhig mchis so//mkhan po de bosau shig/lha bod par bgyi'o zhes de dag gis de bos nas/de rgyal po kri kri ga la ba de du song ste phyin nas/rgyal po kri kri la rgyal
251a7('dul ba): bdapa tshe spel ba byas te mtha' cig tu 'dug pa dang /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha mkhan po 'di lag so//rgyal pos 'ongs pa leg so zhes bya ba'i tshogs gis kun du spyad de smras pa/
251b1('dul ba): mkhan po khyod kho bo'i mdun du bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab par byed nus sam/ser skya zhi bas smras pa/bdag gis rngo ci thog pas rgyal po dges par bgyi'o//rgyal
251b2('dul ba): ngos blon po rnams la bsgo gshes ldan dag rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor shoms shig/phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par zhog shig/blon po rnams kyis rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor
251b3('dul ba): bshams shing phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par bzhag go//de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/lha phyogs snga ma gang bgyid du stsal/rgyal
251b4('dul ba): pos smras pa/bramo ze 'dri mgron pa yin gyis 'di phyogs snga ma byed du chug shig/bram ze de phyogs snga ma byed du bcug nas des rgyud chags lnga brgya bzla so//sere skya zhi bas phyir bzlas te
251b5('dul ba): khyod kyi 'di ni rigs pa med pa yin no//'di ni mi mthun pa yin no//'di ni mo 'thad pa yin no zhes skyon btags pa dang bram ze de cang mi smra bar 'dug/tshar gcad pa'i gonas rnams kyi nang na
251b6('dul ba): 'di lta ste lan la spobs pa med pa 'di ni tha chad yin no//de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas smos pa/mkhan po khyod gnas gang du gnas/sir skya zhi bas smras pa lha ri brags che ge mo zhig
251b7('dul ba): du'o//khyod song la ri brags de khyod kyi rgol ba'i longs spyod gyis shig/ser skya zhi ba rangs pa dang dga' ba dang /michog tu dpa' bor gyur nas/skye bo mkhas pa dag gi sa yongasu bskor
252a1('dul ba): te ri brags der song ngo //'jigs rten ni 'byor pa 'dod pa yin pas ser skya zhi ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed
252a2('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod par byed do//rtse bar byed dpa' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma bu ral pa ser skya can zhig btsas nas/zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsasau

252a4('dul ba): ser skyar 'dug pas khye'u 'di'i ming ser skyar gdag so zhes de'i ming ser skyar ba tagro so//de 'o mo dang zho dang ma rari dang /zhon mar deng mar gyi stong khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag
252a5('dul ba): gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed/skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do//de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe na yi ge dang grangaso dang /rtsis
252a6('dul ba): dang /lag rtsis dang /dbyung ba dang gzhug pa dang gzhag pa dang 'byed pa dang /klog pa'i pha rol tu son cing /de'i tshe na bram ze spyod tshul dang /spyod pa dang gtsang sbra dang /kun tu spyod pa dang //

252b2('dul ba): sbyin pa dong len pa la mkhas pa'i bra mo ze'i rig byed dang rig khyod kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu son dag me la bu'i shes pas rang gi spro ba gsal bar byed de/gzhan gyi smra'i tshe ga cod
252b3('dul ba): nos par gyur to//de'i tshe bram ze ser skya zhi bas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du bcugo//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na shed bu ser s+ya klog pa byed pas pa

252b6('dul ba): padad+ma 'di ltar phas bu la bdag dang mnyam pa'am/khyad par du 'phags pa de ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas/de'i phyir 'di bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyiso//bdag gis
252b7('dul ba): 'di la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag gtad par bya'o snyam du rig nas/bram ze'i khye'u ser skya la smras pa/bu 'di ltar phas bu la bdog dang mnyam pa'am khyad par du 'phags pade
253a1('dul ba): ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir khyod kho bo bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis//khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag
253a2('dul ba): 'dron du chug shig/ser skyas smras pa/bka' bzhin 'tshol 'don du stsal to zhes des bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag bram ze'i gsing tshige dge 'don du gzhug par brtsam so//dam
253a3('dul ba): ze ser skya zhi ba yang bya ba mod cing cir dgar 'gro ba dang spyod pas dga' dgur spyod pare brtsam so//de dus gzhan zhig na drang srong smra bar song ste/der dge slong zhig gi gan du song
253a4('dul ba): nas smras pa/slob dpon tshig 'di'i don ci lags/dge slong des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dri ba de ni de skad dri bar mi bya ste/dri ba de de skad dris na yongasu rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//'di ltar
253a5('dul ba): dri ba de ni 'di skad dri bar bya ste/dri ba de 'di skad dris na tshig 'di'i don 'di yin no zhes yongasu rdzogs par 'gyu ro//bram ze ser skya zhabs la bams pa/bdag gis 'di dag la dri ba
253a6('dul ba): yang 'dri bar mi nus na bdag gis 'di dag dang lhan cig ji ltar smra bar 'gyur snyam nas/de dge slong rnams la shin tu mngon por dad par gyur nas/dus dang dus su dge slong dag
253a7('dul ba): 'gron du bos te khyim gzhan du zan sbyin par byed do//de dus gzhan zhig na na bar gyur nas des shed pu ser skya la smras pa/bu ji tsam na nyi ma 'tshar ba dang /tso tsam na nub pa
253b1('dul ba): de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis kho ba 'das nas smras pa/thams cad dang lhan cig 'jigs pa med pa dang /bag tshab med par smra bar bya'o//'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams ni

254a7('dul ba): kyi phyogs dag rnam par bzhag sa/de dag phyogs snga mo byed du bcug pa dang /smra ba de dag bram ze ser skya dang lhan cig gzhi gang dang gang la smra ba de dang de la bram ze ser skyas

254b4('dul ba): rom snyam du de de ltar sems khongs su chud cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing 'dug pa na/shed pu ser skya smra ba'i rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang

255a1('dul ba): rgol ba'i longs spyod dag phyogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod kyis song la 'di dag tshar chod cig/ser skyas smras pa/yum bdag la ba'i mchid nas bu ji
255a2('dul ba): tsam na nyi ma 'char ba dang /ji tsam na nub pa de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo 'das nas smra ba thams cad dang lhan cig 'jigs pa med pa dang /

256a3('dul ba): pa su zhig snying rje med cing 'jig rten pha rol btang ste/'di dag la rab tu sdang ba'i sems skrod cing 'di dag dang lhan cig rtsod pa skyed par 'gyur snyam du rig nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang /de la

256b6('dul ba): kyai dge slong dag ni rab tu shes pa'i bram tha lags pas drug gis 'dir rab tu byung bar rnami thog gis b+h+yo su bzhud de//dge slong des bram ze de tsA su khrid nis rab tu byung rdzogs pa
256b7('dul ba): bsnyen par byas te/klag pa dang /kha ton dag langes par sbyar te/ser skye sa klag pa da/kha ton 'din ngan sde dro ga du mi bo dag klags shing rdo snod gi su ma dang ldan pa/chos sgeg pa /

257a2('dul ba): ma 'bud du 'jud par byed/rnga bo che rdung du 'jud par byed cing /rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor sdud par byed/skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang mngon par dad par byed do//chos sgrog pa sor
257a3('dul ba): skyes bsams pa bdog gis thos pas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de thob kyis bdag par ne ser song ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas

257a5('dul ba): dang /des bu mthong nas smras pa/bu khyod kyis 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams tshar bcad dme/yum bdag ni lung tsam dang ldan pa lags la de dag ni lung dang rtogs pa dang ldan pa lags
257a6('dul ba): pas de'i slad du bdag gis de dag tshar dgum par ji ltar rngo thogo/bu khyod kyis de dag gdon mi za bar tshar gcad par bya ba dag yin gyis char chod cig/ser skya de ma la gus pas
257a7('dul ba): mas nan gyis mnan pa na/dang du blangs te smras pa/yum gang gi tshe seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur/dung sgril ma bus par gyur/rnga bo che brdungs par gyur cing /rgyal po dang
257b1('dul ba): /bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe na khyod spyon cig/bu legs kyis 'ong bar bya'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ser skya la chos sgrog par gsol ba btab nas seng ge'i khri bshams par
